# This script simulates the behavior of a river
# That is really cool.
# However, this is a simulation. Shouldn't it stop sometimes ? This code that you have here, runs forever.
# In case you wondering, i have left this to run for over half a day last night :)
# Today is 7 May 2023

import time

start_time = time.time()
while True:
    print('The river is flowing...')
    time.sleep(1)
    if time.time() - start_time > 300:
        break
